summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley discussing a significant meeting with Chinese officials, specifically Minister Li Yuanchao, and mentions an upcoming meeting with a prince. The correspondence highlights Staley's involvement in high-level discussions and potential future engagements.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, discussing his recent meetings with Chinese officials.

persons.name: Li Yuanchao
persons.context: Li Yuanchao is mentioned as the Minister of the Organization Department with whom Staley had a significant meeting.

persons.name: Wang Qishan
persons.context: Wang Qishan is referenced in the context of a previous significant meeting with Jamie Dimon.

connections.description: Jes Staley had a meeting with Li Yuanchao regarding government matters.
Jes Staley references a previous meeting with Wang Qishan, indicating a connection to high-level Chinese officials.

events.title: Meeting with Li Yuanchao
events.description: Jes Staley met with Minister Li Yuanchao for almost two hours to discuss government matters.

events.title: Upcoming Meeting with Prince
events.description: Jes Staley mentions an upcoming meeting with a prince in the afternoon.

keyFacts: Jes Staley had a significant meeting with Minister Li Yuanchao of the Organization Department.
Li Yuanchao is expected to be in the Standing Committee in the next Government.
Staley references a previous meeting with Wang Qishan, indicating high-level discussions.
Staley mentions an upcoming meeting with a prince later the same day.
